caller_intent: The caller wants to reinstate their mother's insurance policy and provide necessary details (policy number, personal information, and payment method) to proceed with the reinstatement.
resolution_steps: Agent retrieves the policy using the provided policy number (2023390627) and name (Angela Fowler).
Agent confirms the policy was canceled on December 22nd and explains the reinstatement fee of $285.05.
Agent collects credit card information (ending in 89) for payment.
Agent mentions sending a 'statement of no loss' via e-signature to the email on file (Corey Turner 252@gmail.com).
Agent updates the caller's phone number (828-313-7261) with the carrier (National General).
knowledge_required: Handling policy reinstatement with a carrier (National General)
summary: A caller seeks to reinstate their mother's canceled insurance policy. The agent confirms the policy's cancellation date, explains the $285.05 reinstatement fee, collects payment details, and initiates the process by sending a required 'statement of no loss' via e-signature. The agent also updates the caller's contact information with the carrier. The call concludes with the agent confirming next steps and the caller agreeing to proceed.
